title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, if I open multiple files and select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, sometimes nothing happens.
EB: The 'Close All Saved' feature should close all the open files that have been saved, regardless of the number of files or their content.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open multiple files.
2. Make changes to some of the files and save them.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
4. Verify that all the saved files are closed and no unsaved changes are lost.
